response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $15,000 to you. After careful consideration, we propose to offer it to you at a special price of $12,000. This represents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate. We believe this price reflects the significant value the product offers and would be delighted if you choose to make it yours.", "product_price": 12000}
